title: Roast turkey with herbed butter
ingredients: ['Herb Butter', '125g butter, softened', '1 teaspoon crushed dried thyme (or 1 tablespoon fresh, finely chopped)', '1 teaspoon crushed dried sage (or 1 tablespoon fresh, finely chopped)', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary (or 1 tablespoon fresh)', 'salt', '1 (7kg) whole, ready-to-cook turkey', 'salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour']
